ygData.subject: Re: Technobots
ygData.msgSnippet: Hoist transforms. We go to clear the ruble away from the ship. he then drives towards it. Lightspeed nods then transforms and follows Hoist. They arrive and

Hoist transforms. "We go to clear the ruble away from the ship." he then
drives towards it. Lightspeed nods then transforms and follows Hoist.
They arrive and then then the back of Hoist's truck compartmetn lowers
out into a shovel. He back towards a large pile of ruble as it loads up
into his rear. Lighspeed transforms, and begins to lift large pieces of
rock.

Strafe jumps into the air and transforms, following Scattershot. He then
blasts larger rocks, and as they vaporize he corrects himself in the air
to continue.

Ironhide nods. "Excellent idea." he transforms, and opens up the rear of
the van.
